# AIBridges - AI Consulting for Rhode Island Businesses
# https://aibridges.org

## About
AIBridges provides AI consulting and implementation services for small and medium businesses in Rhode Island and New England. Based in Cranston, RI.

## Services
- AI Agent Discovery & Strategy (free consultation)
- Custom AI Agent Development ($2,500+)
- Agentic Office Retainer ($1,500/month)
- Private/Local AI Deployment for sensitive data
- IT Support for Rhode Island businesses

## Products
- SwiftShot: Court-ready web evidence capture for law firms ($29/seat/month)
- CaseVault: Settlement benchmark database for PI attorneys (free)
- DevScope: Free website audit tool
- StaffSync: Restaurant staff scheduling

## Specialties
- Law firm AI automation (document review, legal research, intake)
- Local/private AI models (no cloud, HIPAA-friendly)
- Legacy system integration with modern AI

## Contact
- Phone: (401) 327-2971
- Email: hello@aibridges.org
- Location: Cranston, Rhode Island, USA
